trends: There have been no other sightings in Oxon Hill
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: In 1947 while living in Arkansas, I observed an object passing over Tyronza, Arkansas that was on fire with a very long fiery tail trailing behind it. The object was traveling from east to west at approximately 15 degrees southwest. I checked our paper the next day, but did not see any reference to the object. It was not until years later I learned about the Roswell incident that I thought about the incident seriously. During that time we lived in the country and watched what we called "shooting stars" almost nightly. This object was obviously not a shooting star. It was low enough so that if I had not been so awe struck, I probably could have heard the noise from the flames. The tail trailing the object was very long and sustained until it went out of site. I checked the location of Roswell NM in reference to Tyronza and I truly believe this was the object that crashed near Roswell, NM. I also do not believe the explanation given by the US Airforce.
